title: Self declaration
description: The information was provided by the individual or entity referred to in this statement, or by their authorised representative.

title: Official register
description: The information was taken from an official register.

title: Third party
description: The information was provided by a third party, not directly related to the individual, entity or interests described by this statement.

title: Primary research
description: The information was provided as a result of research into primary sources.

title: Verified
description: The information has been verified through the process documented in the associated description.
